SELECT S.*, I.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME, M.MIN_IMG_NUM FROM SELL_ITEM S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_EMAIL = M.EMAIL LEFT JOIN IMG I ON S.ITEM_NUM = I.ITEM_NUM JOIN (SELECT MIN(IMG_NUM) AS 'MIN_IMG_NUM' FROM IMG GROUP BY ITEM_NUM) M ON (I.IMG_NUM = M.MIN_IMG_NUM) WHERE S.DELETE_YN = 'n' AND M.DELETE_YN != 'y' ORDER BY S.ITEM_NUM DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELL_ITEM (SELL_TYPE, MEMBER_EMAIL, ITEM_SUB, ITEM_CONTENTS, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_D_TYPE, AUCTION_START_PRICE, AUCTION_MAX_PRICE, AUCTION_MIN_PRICE, AUCTION_PERIOD, AUCTION_RANDOM_METHOD, AUCTION_DISCOUNT_PER_HOUR) VALUES (#{sellType}, #{memberEmail}, #{itemSub}, #{itemContents}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemType} , #{itemDType}, #{auctionStartPrice}, #{auctionMaxPrice}, #{auctionMinPrice}, #{auctionPeriod}, #{auctionRandomMethod}, #{auctionDiscountPerHour})
mapper.select: SELECT S.*, M.*, I.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME, M.MIN_IMG_NUM FROM SELL_ITEM S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_EMAIL = M.EMAIL LEFT JOIN IMG I ON S.ITEM_NUM = I.ITEM_NUM JOIN (SELECT MIN(IMG_NUM) AS 'MIN_IMG_NUM' FROM IMG GROUP BY ITEM_NUM) M ON (I.IMG_NUM = M.MIN_IMG_NUM) WHERE S.ITEM_NUM = #{itemNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE SELL_ITEM SET HIT_CNT = HIT_CNT + 1 WHERE ITEM_NUM = #{itemNum}
